questions.text: Describe the item you need fabricated. Be as detailed as possible.
questions.hint: Include: what it is, what it's for, how it will be used, and any specific requirements. The more detail, the faster and more accurate the quote.

questions.text: Do you have drawings, sketches, or reference images?
options: Yes — hand sketch or reference photos
No — I need help with design

questions.text: Upload your drawings, sketches, or reference photos.
questions.hint: Accepted: photos of hand sketches, PDFs, DXF/DWG references, or even photos of a similar item you want replicated.

questions.text: Design/engineering note: Custom items without drawings require design time. We charge $75-125/hr for design work, which is credited toward fabrication if the project proceeds. Should we include design time in this quote?
options: Yes — include design time in quote
No — I'll provide drawings before fabrication starts
Let's discuss the design first, then decide
questions.hint: Even a rough hand sketch dramatically reduces design time. A napkin drawing is better than no drawing.

options: Not sure — recommend based on application

questions.text: Approximate overall dimensions? (doesn't need to be exact — just gives us scale)
questions.hint: Example: 'about 4 ft x 2 ft x 3 ft tall' or 'fits on a tabletop' or '10 ft long beam'. Scale determines material cost, handling, and shipping.
One-off custom pieces require full setup time. Multiple identical pieces amortize setup across units — significant savings at 5+ units.
Standard fab shop tolerance is +/- 1/8". Anything tighter requires more setup time, checking, and possibly CNC operations. Machine-shop tolerances may require a different vendor.

options: Not sure — recommend based on use

questions.text: Do you need installation or delivery?
questions.hint: Large or heavy items may need freight shipping. We can arrange crating and LTL freight.
City or zip code for travel time.
City/state or zip code. Commercial address or residential? (Residential delivery costs more for freight.)
